languages.text: {n}Клеменциа Версериан смотрит прямо на вас, словно бы префекта и не существует вовсе. Сложив руки аквилой, она негромко выговаривает:{/n} "Род Версериан верен Вольному Торговцу".
{n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа Версериан смотрит прямо на вас, словно бы префекта и не существует вовсе. Сложив руки аквилой, она негромко выговаривает:{/n} "Род Версериан верен Вольному Торговцу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Lord Captain."
{n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Lord Captain."
{n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Lord Captain."
{n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Rogue Trader."
{n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}Clementia Werserian sieht dich direkt an als würde die Präfektin gar nicht existieren. Sie macht das Zeichen des Adlers und spricht mit gedämpfter Stimme:{/n} "Haus Werserian ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia Werserian sieht dich direkt an als würde die Präfektin gar nicht existieren. Sie macht das Zeichen des Adlers und spricht mit gedämpfter Stimme:{/n} "Haus Werserian ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} treu ergeben."

languages.text: {n}Clementia Werserian braque son regard sur vous comme si la préfète n'existait pas, puis fait le signe de l'Aquila avant de déclarer à mi-voix :{/n} « La maison Werserian est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia Werserian braque son regard sur vous comme si la préfète n'existait pas, puis fait le signe de l'Aquila avant de déclarer à mi-voix :{/n} « La maison Werserian est loyale {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅·韦尔森直直地望向你，仿佛行政官根本不存在一样。她做了个双头鹰手势，低声开了口。{/n}“韦尔森家族始终效忠于行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅·韦尔森直直地望向你，仿佛行政官根本不存在一样。她做了个双头鹰手势，低声开了口。{/n}“韦尔森家族始终效忠于行商浪人。”

languages.text: {n}Clementia Werserian te mira directamente, como si la prefecta no existiera. Hace el signo del Aquila y habla con voz grave:{/n} «La casa Werserian es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia Werserian te mira directamente, como si la prefecta no existiera. Hace el signo del Aquila y habla con voz grave:{/n} «La casa Werserian es leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}クレメンティア・ウェルザリアンは、まるで総監など存在しないかのように、まっすぐあなたを見つめる。彼女はアクィラの印を結び、低い声で言った。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓います」
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティア・ウェルザリアンは、まるで総監など存在しないかのように、まっすぐあなたを見つめる。彼女はアクィラの印を結び、低い声で言った。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家はローグトレーダーに忠誠を誓います」

languages.text: {n}Clementia Werserian, prefekt orada yokmuş gibi doğrudan sana bakıyor. Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yaptıktan sonra kısık bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia Werserian looks straight at you as if the prefect does not even exist. She makes the sign of the Aquila and speaks in a low voice:{/n} "House Werserian is loyal to the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia Werserian, prefekt orada yokmuşçasına, doğrudan sana bakıyor. Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yaptıktan sonra kısık bir sesle konuşuyor: {/n} "Werserian Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e sadıktır."
